price: Sε wͻdane wͻn ho (firi nokorε no ho) a, wodeε w’adwuma ne sε wobεbͻ asεm no ho dawuro akyerεkyerε mu.
arabic: فَإِن تَوَلَّوۡاْ فَإِنَّمَا عَلَيۡكَ ٱلۡبَلَٰغُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fa-in tawallaw fa-innamā ʿalayka al-balāghu al-mubīnu
